title: Amazon API Gateway to Amazon Kinesis
description: Create an Amazon API Gateway to Amazon Kinesis REST API

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern creates an Amazon API Gateway REST API that integrates with an Amazon Kinesis Data Stream using the AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) in Typescript.
